      Methods in i5.las2peer.api with parameters of type Agent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void Service.logError(int index, Agent actingUser, java.lang.String message)
      Deprecated. 
      Use i5.las2peer.logging.L2pLogger#logEvent(Event, Agent, String) instead!

      Writes an error message. The given index (1-99) can be used to differentiate between different log messages.
      protected void Service.logMessage(int index, Agent actingUser, java.lang.String message)
      Deprecated. 
      Use i5.las2peer.logging.L2pLogger#logEvent(Event, Agent, String) instead!

      Writes a log message. The given index (1-99) can be used to differentiate between different log messages.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Message.open(Agent unlockedRecipient, AgentStorage storage)
      open the envelope, i.e. decrypt the content with the private key of the receiving agent the private key has to be unlocked first!

    • Uses of Agent in i5.las2peer.security

      Subclasses of Agent in i5.las2peer.security 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GroupAgent
      An agent representing a group of other agents.
      class  MonitoringAgent
      A MonitoringAgent is responsible for sending monitoring information collected at the MonitoringObserver.
      class  PassphraseAgent
      Base class for pass phrase protected agents.
      class  ServiceAgent
      A service agent represents a service and its access rights in the las2peer setting.
      class  UserAgent
      An UserAgent represent a (End)user of the las2peer system.

      static void Context.logError(java.lang.Object from, int index, java.lang.String message, Agent serviceAgent, Agent actingUser)
      Deprecated. 
      Use L2pLogger#logEvent(Object, Event, String, Agent, Agent) instead!

      Writes an error message. The given index (1-99) can be used to differentiate between different log messages. The serviceAgent and userAgent can be set to null if not known. Then this message will not be monitored by the monitoring observer.
      static void Context.logMessage(java.lang.Object from, int index, java.lang.String message, Agent serviceAgent, Agent actingUser)
      Deprecated. 
      Use L2pLogger#logEvent(Object, Event, String, Agent, Agent) instead!

      Writes a log message. The given index (1-99) can be used to differentiate between different log messages. The serviceAgent and actingUser can be set to null if not known. Then this message will not be monitored by the monitoring observer.
      void BasicAgentStorage.registerAgent(Agent agent)
      register an agent for later use use a locked copy to store
      void BasicAgentStorage.registerAgents(Agent... agents)
      register multiple agents to this storage
      void GroupAgent.removeMember(Agent a)
      remove a member from this group
      void GroupAgent.removeMemberRecursive(Agent a)
      remove a member from this group and recursivly from all sub groups
